description:
The town of Guri is inhabited mostly by humans but also by a small number of "nests" for humanoid beings with wings on their back, called "Haibane" (灰羽 = Ashen Wings).
The town is surrounded by a huge wall, and none of the inhabitants may leave the town or even know what`s outside. Only the Touga, humans hiding behind masks, occasionally visit the town from outside in order to trade goods but they`re not allowed to speak inside the town, and the only one able to communicate with them (through hand signs) is the leader of the Haibane Renmei, the http://anidb.net/ch14488 [Washi].
name: Guri
